title: Burst, Ye Emerald Gates
verses:
Burst, ye emerald gates, and bring
To my raptured vision
All the ecstatic joys that spring
Round the bright Elysian!

Lo! we lift our longing eyes;
Break, ye intervening skies!
Sons of righteousness, arise!
Ope the gates of paradise!
chorus:
O, how good it is to be blest,
And dwell where loving Jesus is!

metadata.theological_significance: Vivid portrayal of heavenly worship scene with twenty-four elders and angelic choirs praising Jesus
